availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: David C. Mix (Ballard Co. Carding machine operator)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, carding machine operator. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth J. Ellis Mix in 1856. Father of Ella Mix, Millie Mix, and Mary Mix.

ab.bibl:
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ballard County, District 8, p. 12.
Kentucky, County Marriage Records, 1783-1965, Ancestry, Marriages, Ballard County, 1856.
Find A Grave, "David C. Mix (1834-1917)," Memorial #93084442, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/93084442 (accessed February 14, 2018).
